wikipedia_page.main: Nigel Frederick Turner (8 August 1914 – 31 January 1962) was an English first-class cricketer active 1932–38 who played for Middlesex. He was born in Paddington; died in Swindon.

response: * The Men Who Killed Kennedy (1991). Directed by Nigel Turner.

link_mentions.page: Assassination of John F. Kennedy in popular culture
response: * Nigel Turner's 1988, 1991, 1995 and 2003 continuing documentary The Men Who Killed Kennedy explores conspiracy theories of the assassination.
